incidents.name: [RBX7][Dedicated Servers] - Rack R709B10 incident notification.
incidents.message: We have determined the origin of the incident affecting our Dedicated Servers offer on the specific rack R709B10 . Here is detail for this incident : Start time : 18/05/2025 07:24 UTC Impacted Service(s) : Some servers are unreachable Customers Impact : Some customers are temporarily unable to access and use their servers in the rack R709B10. . Root Cause : This incident is caused by a network equipment issue. Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution. We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
